name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Proficient in programming and data structures, with a strong understanding of algorithms and distributed systems, I am a Senior Engineer with over 10 years of experience in backend and microservices development. My technical expertise lies in leveraging **Java**, **Apache Flink**, **AWS**, **Kubernetes**, and other cloud-native solutions to build robust, scalable, and efficient architectures. Experienced in crafting high-performing APIs and automation tools, I have a successful history of delivering impactful solutions in financial platforms and AI/ML pipelines. I have contributed to significant projects at renowned organizations such as VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska.

Utilized advanced programming skills to develop scalable backend architectures employing **Python** and **FastAPI**, optimizing document automation, user onboarding, and reporting workflows.
Designed and implemented **microservices** architecture to enhance system performance and maintainability, serving an average of **100** concurrent users.
Engineered event-driven solutions using **Celery** and **Redis**, achieving a **30%** increase in efficiency for managing asynchronous processing of financial transaction requests.
Executed deployment of microservices on **Azure App Services**, leveraging **Terraform** for infrastructure as code, which improved deployment speed by **50%**.
Constructed and managed reliable data pipelines for regulatory data exchange with **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Functions**, ensuring accurate and timely data flow with a **95%** data accuracy rate.
Conducted comprehensive security assessments and integrated **OAuth2** and **Azure AD B2C** for robust, scalable authentication systems that support **10,000+** users.
Collaborated effectively with cross-functional teams to solve complex system integration challenges, ensuring compliance with industry standards and managing release strategies for over **20** major project launches.

• Developed backend systems using **Python** and **FastAPI** to automate document workflows, streamline user onboarding, and handle complex reporting processes.

• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to facilitate smooth system integration, maintain regulatory compliance, and ensure successful release management across **5** major projects.

- Collaborated with frontend teams to integrate **REST APIs** and **WebSocket** channels, improving user interaction and satisfaction by **25%**.

- Introduced task management strategies using **Celery** and **RabbitMQ**, optimizing backend operations and achieving a **50%** improvement in task execution efficiency.
- Enhanced data structures and algorithms to support distributed systems, integrating with **AWS** cloud services and leveraging tools like **Kubernetes** for container orchestration.
